rows.label: tlk41400072_01_msg0001
rows.name:
You have a Blade with you.
...I have a request.

rows.label: tlk41400072_01_msg0002
rows.name:
With your Blade... please don't
hurt people... us, who are powerless.

rows.label: tlk41400072_01_msg0003
rows.name:
People with the aptitude to be Drivers, or
soldiers trained to fight, can resist,
but we can't.

rows.label: tlk41400072_01_msg0004
rows.name:
We just wanted to live quietly...
Because of Blades, we were driven from our homes
and lost our families...
